USER_PASSWORD_RESET_REQUEST.SUBJECT: Reset Your Finance Tracker Account Password
USER_PASSWORD_RESET_REQUEST.INTRO:
We received a request to reset your password for your account at Finance Tracker.
To complete this process, please follow the instructions below.
USER_PASSWORD_RESET_REQUEST.OUTRO:
Please note:
  • This password reset link is valid for a limited time, so make sure to use it promptly.
  • If you did not request this password reset, please contact us immediately. It may indicate a potential security concern.

Steps to reset your password:
  1. Click on the "Password Reset" button above.
  2. You will be directed to a secure page where you can create a new password.
  3. Choose a strong and unique password and enter it in the designated fields.
  4. Confirm your new password by re-entering it.
  5. Save your changes.

After completing these steps, your password will be successfully reset and you can log in to your account.
If you encounter any issues or need further assistance, please reach out to us.

Thank you for choosing Finance Tracker. Your security and privacy are our top priorities, and we are committed to providing a safe and smooth experience.

Best regards,
Team Finance Tracker
